00052 class LogStream;

00054 // Maximum length of a log message. Longer messages are rejected.
00055 #define MAX_LOG_MESSAGE_LENGTH 1024u
00056 
00057 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 class ASSIMP_API Logger
00063 #ifndef SWIG
00064     : public Intern::AllocateFromAssimpHeap
00065 #endif
00066 {
00067 public:
00068 
00069     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00073     enum LogSeverity
00074     {
00075         NORMAL,     
00076         VERBOSE     
00077     };
00078 
00079     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087     enum ErrorSeverity
00088     {
00089         Debugging   = 1,    
00090         Info        = 2,    
00091         Warn        = 4,    
00092         Err         = 8     
00093     };
00094 
00095 public:
00096 
00098     virtual ~Logger();
00099 
00100     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00103     void debug(const char* message);
00104     inline void debug(const std::string &message);
00105 
00106     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00109     void info(const char* message);
00110     inline void info(const std::string &message);
00111 
00112     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00115     void warn(const char* message);
00116     inline void warn(const std::string &message);
00117 
00118     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     void error(const char* message);
00122     inline void error(const std::string &message);
00123 
00124     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00127     void setLogSeverity(LogSeverity log_severity);
00128 
00129     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00131     LogSeverity getLogSeverity() const;
00132 
00133     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00145     virtual bool attachStream(LogStream *pStream,
00146         unsigned int severity = Debugging | Err | Warn | Info) = 0;
00147 
00148     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00157     virtual bool detatchStream(LogStream *pStream,
00158         unsigned int severity = Debugging | Err | Warn | Info) = 0;
00159 
00160 protected:
00161 
00163     Logger();
00164 
00166     explicit Logger(LogSeverity severity);
00167 
00168     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00175     virtual void OnDebug(const char* message)= 0;
00176 
00177     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00184     virtual void OnInfo(const char* message) = 0;
00185 
00186     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00193     virtual void OnWarn(const char* essage) = 0;
00194 
00195     // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00202     virtual void OnError(const char* message) = 0;
00203 
00204 protected:
00205 
00207     LogSeverity m_Severity;
00208 };
00209 
00210 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00211 //  Default constructor
00212 inline Logger::Logger() {
00213     setLogSeverity(NORMAL);
00214 }
00215 
00216 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00217 //  Virtual destructor
00218 inline  Logger::~Logger()
00219 {
00220 }
00221 
00222 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00223 // Construction with given logging severity
00224 inline Logger::Logger(LogSeverity severity) {
00225     setLogSeverity(severity);
00226 }

00231     m_Severity = log_severity;
00232 }
00233 
00234 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00238 }
